8112.name: Electrocute
8112.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

8128.name: Dark Harvest
8128.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.

9923.name: Hail of Blades
9923.shortDesc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.

8126.name: Cheap Shot
8126.shortDesc: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

8139.name: Taste of Blood
8139.shortDesc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

8143.name: Sudden Impact
8143.shortDesc: Damaging basic attacks and abilities deal bonus true damage to enemy champions after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.

8137.name: Sixth Sense
8137.shortDesc:
On a long Cooldown, automatically sense a nearby untracked and unseen ward, tracking it for the team.

Level 11: Also reveal the ward for 10s.

8140.name: Grisly Mementos
8140.shortDesc:
Collect 1 memento on champion takedowns, up to 18 total.

Gain 6 Trinket Haste for each collected.

8141.name: Deep Ward
8141.shortDesc:
Your wards in the enemy jungle are Deep, gaining Health and Duration.

Level 9: Wards in the river are also Deep.

8135.name: Treasure Hunter
8135.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant additional gold the first time they are collected.

8106.name: Ultimate Hunter
8106.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.

8351.name: Glacial Augment
8351.shortDesc: Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays that slow nearby enemies and reduce their damage to your allies.

8360.name: Unsealed Spellbook
8360.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.

8369.name: First Strike
8369.shortDesc: When you initiate champion combat, deal 7% extra damage for 3 seconds and gain gold based on damage dealt.

8306.name: Hextech Flashtraption
8306.shortDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.

8304.name: Magical Footwear
8304.shortDesc: You get free boots at 12 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 45s sooner.

8321.name: Cash Back
8321.shortDesc: Get some gold back when you purchase Legendary Items.

8313.name: Triple Tonic
8313.shortDesc:
Upon reaching level 3, gain an Elixir of Avarice.
Upon reaching level 6, gain an Elixir of Force.
Upon reaching level 9, gain an Elixir of Skill.

8345.name: Biscuit Delivery
8345.shortDesc: Gain a free Biscuit every 2 min, until 6 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max health and restores health.

8410.name: Approach Velocity
8410.shortDesc: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby enemy champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>, increased for enemy champions that you impair.

8316.name: Jack Of All Trades
8316.shortDesc:
For each different stat gained from items, gain one Jack stack. Each stack grants you 1 Ability Haste.

Gain bonus Adaptive Force at 5 and 10 stacks.

8005.name: Press the Attack
8005.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times deals bonus damage and amplifies your damage until you leave combat with champions.

8008.name: Lethal Tempo
8008.shortDesc: Attacking an enemy champion grants you Attack Speed, up to 6 stacks. At max stacks, deal <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>bonus adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> On-Attack.

8021.name: Fleet Footwork
8021.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

8010.name: Conqueror
8010.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.

9111.name: Triumph
9111.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 5% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.

8009.name: Presence of Mind
8009.shortDesc: Restore a small amount of mana or energy when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.

9105.name: Legend: Haste
9105.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Basic Ability Haste.

9103.name: Legend: Bloodline
9103.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Life Steal, up to a cap. Once the cap is reached, increase your max health. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.

8014.name: Coup de Grace
8014.shortDesc: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.

8017.name: Cut Down
8017.shortDesc: Deal more damage to high health enemy champions.

8299.name: Last Stand
8299.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.

8437.name: Grasp of the Undying
8437.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.

8439.name: Aftershock
8439.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.

8465.name: Guardian
8465.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.

8446.name: Demolish
8446.shortDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.

8463.name: Font of Life
8463.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion heals nearby allied champions.

8401.name: Shield Bash
8401.shortDesc: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.

8429.name: Conditioning
8429.shortDesc: After 12 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 3%.

8444.name: Second Wind
8444.shortDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.

8473.name: Bone Plating
8473.shortDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 (based on level) less damage.

Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 55s

8451.name: Overgrowth
8451.shortDesc: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.

8453.name: Revitalize
8453.shortDesc:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.

8242.name: Unflinching
8242.shortDesc: Gain Armor and Magic Resist when receiving crowd control.

8214.name: Summon Aery
8214.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.

8229.name: Arcane Comet
8229.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.

8230.name: Phase Rush
8230.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS and Slow Resist.

8224.name: Axiom Arcanist
8224.shortDesc: Your Ultimate has increased damage, healing, and shielding. Scoring a takedown on an enemy champion reduces your Ultimate's current cooldown.

8226.name: Manaflow Band
8226.shortDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

8275.name: Nimbus Cloak
8275.shortDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.

8210.name: Transcendence
8210.shortDesc:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

8234.name: Celerity
8234.shortDesc: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.

8233.name: Absolute Focus
8233.shortDesc: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

8237.name: Scorch
8237.shortDesc: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.

8232.name: Waterwalking
8232.shortDesc: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.

8236.name: Gathering Storm
8236.shortDesc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.
